ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank Agata Biernat for cultivating the plants in the Botanical Garden of Medicinal Plants. We would like to thank Hanna Czapor-Irzabek for technical assistance in UHPLC-QTOF-MS data analysis. Measurements were carried out in the Laboratory of Elemental Analysis and Structural Research at Wroclaw Medical University.
